Title: Sick
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Nichole Beattie
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden, Norman Reedus
Plot: As Hershel's condition worsens, Rick, Daryl and T-Dog deal with a group of prisoners.
